settings.title: Install the Unbridaled Shopify App
settings.answer:
1.  Install the Unbridaled App 

2.  Follow the instructions in the App’s Admin for Setup.

3.  Add ILA Designs (Atelier & Jewelry Plan Only) 

Request ILA Inventory file from your Account Executive
Upload files in your store to:  Products->Import
All products with images & pricing will be uploaded

settings.title: Install UI Updates
settings.answer: You will be notified via email when Unbridaled updates the app's UI.  Here is a video showing you how to Install the UI Update.

settings.title: Credit Card Settings
settings.answer:
Retail Partners must verify that their merchant processor will allow charges up to and possibly over 20,000USD in order to transact diamonds via their customer’s credit cards.

For In-Store only subscriptions the Retail Partner can opt to process the transactions through the in-store Unbridaled site.  We will credit the value of the payment minus credit card processing fees and the wholesale cost of the jewelry and diamonds.

settings.title: Shopify Wrapper that Contains Add To Cart
settings.answer: Minimum width recommendation is 500px for Unbridaled to display properly and not look squished.

settings.title: Two Ways to Edit Unbridaled Themeing
settings.answer:
App frontend styles can be overwritten by the theme styles.css

Edit Unbridaled Liquid Directly
Warning:  occasionally Unbridaled updates the front end of the app.  These updates will require you to re-install the app into your theme using our settings.  This will overwrite any changes you make to Unbridaled’s front-end styles, so version management and merging changes will be the Retail Partner's responsibility.

settings.title: Enable Products for Unbridaled
settings.answer:
In your Shopify Store admin goto the product you want to enable.

     Click:  More actions -> Unbridaled Setup

Follow the instructions on the Unbridaled Product setup page

settings.title: Hide Diamond Products from Search Results
settings.answer:
When Unbridaled adds a diamond to your store by default it will be shown in your collections/all and potentially in search results. The Unbridaled app always adds these diamonds with:

Vendor: “Unbridaled Diamond”

Tag: “_unbridaled_product”

You can hide products containing the _unbridaled_product tag by using the unless feature in Shopify when iterating over a collection's products. 

When iterating we can use 

{% unless product.tags contains '_unbridaled_product' %} 

to encapsulate the product's code and close with a 

{% endunless %} code. 

This means that a product that contains the_unbridaled_product tag will be skipped during the product iteration.

settings.title: What if I want my Shopify Product to hold different diamond shapes?
settings.answer: Adding functionality to an engagement ring product, for example, so you can show different center stone shapes, is part of your theme customizations and not part of Unbridaled.  Underneath in Shopify they would have to be different variants or different products that your theme handles as a configuration.  Unbridaled only adds a diamond to the variant that is showing on the product page when it is added to the cart.

settings.title: Access Admin Mode
settings.answer: Double Click (or tap on touch devices) on the word "Results" in Diamond Results.  This is a hidden link that will pop up a window to enter your pin code.

settings.title: Add an Admin Memo User
settings.answer:
Create a “Customer” Account on your Store that you will use to login to access Memo functionality.

Add the tag:  _unbridaled_memo_user

settings.title: Link Advanced Diamond Search to your store
Set the Admin Password
settings.answer:
Go to the Unbridaled App in our Shopify Admin.  Then click on:

Settings->Advanced Diamond Search Configuration

settings.title: Sell Diamonds & Bridal Online with Unbridaled
settings.content: Add your own custom content to give more information about your store, availability details...

settings.title: ADD UNBRIDALED TO YOUR SITE
settings.text: Install it in under 5 minutes, and transforms your online and in-store sales.

settings.title: START SELLING
settings.text: Now sell engagement rings in different diamond sizes & qualities!

settings.title: ONLY PAY FOR DIAMONDS YOU SELL
settings.text: You sell a diamond, we ship it, then you pay.

settings.title: Increase Revenue Exponentially
settings.text: Selling the same design at all of your customer's price-points, opens up infinite sources of revenue.
